attributes.action: Remove all Road Calming measures to help save the environment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Road Calming measures such as Humps, Cushions, Sleeping Policemen and Chicanes have been proved to increase polution due to vehicles having to use a lower gear and accelerate between measures, over a vehicle travelling at a constant speed. The alternative will be to use Vehicle Activated Signs, which have been proved to reduce speeds in appropriate places

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to " Remove all Road Calming measures to help save the environment."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13000.asp

Prime Minister's Office
